name: Electricity Consumption Record Report
query:
select 
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.site_name as "Site Name:Data/Site Name",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.state as "State:Data/State",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.district as "District:Data/District",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.electricty_provider as "Electricty Provider:Data/Electricty Provider",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.previous_meter_reading as "Previous Meter reading:Float/Previous Meter reading",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.meter_reading as "Current Meter reading:Float/Current Meter reading",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.powercut_frequency as "Powercut frequency:Select/Powercut frequency",
    `tabElectricity Consumption Record`.total_billable_unit as "Total Billable Unit:Select/Total Billable Unit",
    count(district) as "total District"
from `tabElectricity Consumption Record`
Group by 'district';
